header.rec_loc: A car journey from Manchester to Cornwall (going on holiday)
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Electric cars, journey, caravan, traffic, sun cream/ sunlight, vegetarianism, food/cooking, money, showers/ water, university accommodation, swimming/ sea, car park, global warming, forests/ wildlife, foxhunting, animals, evolution, species, mountains, vegetables/ food production, diving, submarines, directions, broadcasting/ speaking, trains, languages, countries, weather, Daphne Du Maurier, books, navigation,
header.activity: Father and daughter converse on journey to Cornwall (summer holiday)
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, anecdote telling, making arrangements
